comment._content: "On May 23, 1911, the main branch of the New York Public Library was officially opened in a ceremony presided over by President William Howard Taft. " - Wikipedia

comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo of opening day at the New York Public Library shows the White Steamer carrying President William Howard Taft -- but unluckily does not show the great man himself:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163523288/in/photostream/]
